kv16.6:2.5: nanu anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:2.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.6:3.1: Alobho sahetuko sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.3: Rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.21: anottappaṁ sahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.23: Rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.1: Rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.3: Alobho sahetuko anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.5: rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.8: anottappaṁ sahetukaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:5.6: Hañci rūpaṁ sappaccayaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
